Post_body: [Pre-Match Discussion Thread] Inter vs Como (Serie A, Matchday 17)

Commenti.Body: Score some goals early then sub out our starters and play slow
Every match has to be a win, unfortunately. Atalanta won't stop, the triplechins.
Let Paz score 1 but lose and Lautaro go pat on his back after match.
Will be exciting to see Nico Paz against our team. Expecting a win to keep up with Napoli & Atalantaâ€™s wins
Dont let that Como bus leave the city with Nico Paz onboard after the game
Boring! Let's rotate the squad, and sub in 5 starters in the 60th when 0 - 0. 90th minute winner incoming!

Lol yeah, why not? Tucu at min 89, then disallowed goal\\missed penalty for Como at 90+6. After that, straight to my doctor for some nerve painkillers.

edit

Oh and don't forget a few endless var checks.
